title: Aggregate Compensation on a Daily Basis, Railway Workers for United States
notes:
Beginning In 1932, Smithing And Terminal Companies Are Not Included Within The Dataset. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission Wage Statistics

This NBER data series m08175 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.
